divs: sighting details1. i was driving home from shopping. i turned down tilden road, which is the road we live on. it was dark outside and around 9:15 pm. the intersection i turned from was route 700. 2. tilden rd is a very dark country road. i immediately saw a bright red light over the north side of the road. because the road is so dark, the light stood out right away. it was a small globe of a red light that blinked on and off. although i looked very hard, there were no other colored lights associated with the globe. that seemed odd to me because airplanes and helicopters always have white or green lights too. 3. at first i thought it was mars but then i realized it was too bright to be mars and was in the wrong spot in the sky. then i saw that it was moving, slowly, from north to south, and i knew it could not be a planet. it was a small globe of a bright red light. of course i thought it could be an airplane or a helicopter, but then it started to zig-zag up and down slowly in a meandering line, which no aircraft would do. it made no sound and seemed to be about 10-15 treetop levels up in the sky. again, it did not have any white or green lights associated with it; it was just red. it blinked slowly. 4. it moved slowly from north to south. i turned a bend in the road and lost the object behind some trees. i drove a short way down the road to my house, and got out of the car. i could not see the light in the sky above the house. i went inside and told my husband al about the light. he wanted to see it, but i wanted to i stay home (i'm 9-1\2 month's pregnant and did not feel like leaving the house again). he got into the car and drive down tilden rd toward allyn rd to look for the light. he was driving west. he caught sight of the red globe on the north side of tilden rd a short way away from our house, above a clearing. he said when he saw the red light it did not blink on and off at all and stayed steady. it was halfway between the middle of the sky and the horizon. it did not appear to be moving. as soon as he pulled the car over and got a good look, it suddenly disappeared, as if it knew he was looking at it. it was not near any trees or clouds, it just disappeared. **what is noteworthy is that when i saw the light, it was traceling from north to south, but when my husband al saw the light, it was in the far north region of the sky!** 5. we were both very spooked by the light but also intrigued. i have completed college-level astronomy coursework and have engaged in skywatching, and i feel the object was out of the ordinary. my husband and i were both scared by the light. 6. my husband drove home and told me what he saw. after some debating, i decided to take another look and we both got into the car and drove down the road to clearing. we did not see the red light again, but as we turned around to drive east to go home, we both clearly saw a bright white light flash up in the sky directly ahead of and above us. tilden rd is extremely rural and there are no light sources on or near the road.
Summary: My husband and I saw a red light in the sky that zig-zagged and disappeared
